message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For a limited time, I'm offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $110. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece worth more than what you're paying for. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.
